com.forst.lukas.pibe.fragment

Class SettingsFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.forst.lukas.pibe.fragment.SettingsFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener 

    public class SettingsFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
    Fragment with application settings and connection to the server.
    Author:
    Lukas Forst
